data.title: Mr Compromise to lead the European Commission
data.meta_description: The European Union’s leaders have finally agreed on a new president of the European Commission: Portugal’s prime minister, José Manuel Durão Barroso. Though the row over the commission’s new boss is over, the bitterness will not fade so soon | News
data.text:
The European Union’s leaders have finally agreed on a new president of the European Commission: Portugal’s prime minister, José Manuel Durão Barroso. Though the row over the commission’s new boss is over, the bitterness will not fade so soon

Jun 29th 2004|
